reactor.io.net

Interface NetChannel<IN,OUT>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractNetChannel, NettyNetChannel, ZeroMQNetChannel

    public interface NetChannel<IN,OUT>
    NetChannel implementations handle interacting with the client.
    Author:
    Jon Brisbin

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  NetChannel.ConsumerSpec
      Spec class for assigning multiple event handlers on a channel.

    • Method Summary
